section.p:
As you turn into the small square beside the Founder’s Fountain, a man wrapped in a grey cloak brushes swiftly past you. An instant later you realize he has
stolen any money
you had on you.
(If you had no money, he stole one possession instead - you choose which.)

You whirl. There is no sign of the scoundrel.
if you want to try to track him.
